attributes.action: Abolish Inheritance tax on estates worth under £1,000,000 (one million pounds)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inheritance tax used to effect only the rich but, now it is effecting the likes of ordinary, hard working people who want to leave something for their children when they die and not for Gordon Brown's slush fund.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
